topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5583b7d563687213a900223b#post_5583b7d563687213a900223b
He was shaking when he brought the doll of the character out from how nervous he was cause he legitimately cares about the game he's making and wants it to be good and talking about how he got the idea for the game from his family.

I have a feeling the second someone tries to be a ass to him for the sake of being a ass their ass is going to be grass.

"Look at how badly he was shaking when he brought the doll out":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=buhUO3QGeo0



"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5583b8716368727a970002fc#post_5583b8716368727a970002fc
It's not controlled by them.  In fact they have next to no control over it; it's just that they're *trying* to kick out everyone who isn't a tumblrite and throwing shitfits.  The overwhelming majority of the video game industry is anti-sjw cause sjw have been sending them death threats, calling their families and threatening them, stealing people's bank accounts and telling them to go kill themselves.  The video game industry hates sjw now.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

I really wish I could say the same for comics and movies though...

Are there any indies comic producers?
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5583b94a63687274670029b8#post_5583b94a63687274670029b8
When you get down to it the video game industry has become anti-feminist because for the past year feminists have been sending them death threats, telling video game makers to kill themselves, stealing people's personal information, saying that they're going to get them thrown in jail, saying that they're going to accuse them of rape to get them thrown in jail, accusing them of being pedophiles, committing cyberterrorism to try to bring down companies, rather than buying games they're primarily torrenting now, trying to get kickstarters removed, trying to get companies' finances frozen, etc, etc.

If you're worried about video games becoming like comic books it's not going to happen, cause with all the shit they've been getting the video game industry is drastically becoming anti-feminist.

Tl:dr; calling someone's family and telling them that you're going to kill them unless you come out in support of them is not a effective strategy to get support.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
I know you guys don't want thread overlap, but gamergate is ending; it's finally ending.

AAA companies, the main head behind diablo and the duke nukem series have told them to fuck off, Ubisoft told them to fuck off, Oculus told them to fuck off, etc.

Sorry sjw/3rd wavers/feminists/anti-gg it's legitimately game over and you lost.  Gamergate is officially ending cause Jack Thompson 2.0 couldn't keep her damn mouth shut and now AAA video game companies are banning anti-gg from E3 or any game conference.

Tl:dr;  And banished to the fucking shadow realm!
